title: ScaleAI Aims to Secure US Technological Edge in the AI Arms Race Against China
description: In a world where technological superiority is seen as paramount in geopolitical conflicts, 26-year-old CEO Alexandr Wang and his company, ScaleAI, are stepping into the fray as the United States faces off against China in the AI arms race. The stakes are high, with Wang highlighting the critical role of AI in maintaining the U.S. ... Read more
